name: Turkey and Brie Croissant with Cranberry-Orange Aioli
author: metread
summary: Perfectly warm Brie cheese complements this tangy, flaky croissant sandwich.
ingredients: ⅛ cup dried cranberries, roughly chopped
¼ pound sliced deli turkey meat
directions: Mix mayonnaise, orange juice, and dried cranberries together in a small bowl for aioli
Warm a nonstick skillet or panini pan over medium heat
Place 4 apple slices onto the bottom half of each croissant
Top with turkey, followed by Brie cheese, divided equally
Spread aioli mixture on the inside of each croissant top half, and top each sandwich
Place assembled sandwiches into the heated pan and lightly toast until desired color is reached and cheese is slightly melted, 2 to 3 minutes per side
